content:
Hello,

This is Keonna Simon. My kerberos is kcsimon@mit.edu. For finger exercise 9, I have a 100% score. However, on the score page, it says I have 0%. I was wondering why it is like this.

Kind regards,

Keonna Simon.
subject: Missing grade

content: I've fixed the issue, the Scores page now shows the correct score.
